{{{ From the tcpdump file:

Public key: C20A1D8B3903E1864D14A4D1F32CE57E4665FC5683960D2F7C0F30D5D247F5FA264FA66B49E801943AB68BE3D9A4B393AE22963888BF145F07101616E62E0DB2B04644524516C966D8923ACF12AF049A1D9D6FE3E786763613EE9B8F541291DCF8F0AC9DCCC5D47565EF332D466BC80DC5763F1B1139F14D3C0BAE072725815F
Message: 49F573321BDB3AD0A78F0E0C7CD4F4AA2A6D5911C90540DDBBAF067C6AABACCDE78C8FF70C5A4ABE7D4EFA19074A5249B2E6525A0168C0C49535BC993EFB7E2C221F4F349A014477D4134F03413FD7241303E634499313034DBB4AC96606FAED5DE01E784F2706E85BF3E814F5F88027B8AECCF18C928821C9D2D830B5050A1E

}}}
{{{ Solution:

To get the factors of the public key, we use Euclid's Algorithm on the public
key we're given and a number of other keys that we fetch from the key-generation
server (See analysis by Lenstra, Hughes, Augier, Bos, Kleinjung, and Wachter in 2012)

Within 30 seconds of manually executing the fetch script, we got the following
collisions:
One factor of the public key: 12068007193924458934136437678747032125702047288192605563386647134926126290032925205587466786811951860570462107503408192389036293790565313661792631609456701
Second factor of the public key: 11290942893206290336467162060839444758991526481896862143525109986063294905531141292368885863941910700698869187227122590028398079775349558555477255622057419

Next, we code the implementation (RSA.java) of the RSA algorithm to decrypt the message

The message is: 41494331723717004087840363038436379137678883897083290482504777727264502253603851759718429929339251785330232810578894088434140357577326859552100822540305154760883449774383987636028167175968532867374560076986174085246917601557997651752239365247146390720857679075750704377311507373191982
Which converted to hexadecimal is: 476F6F64207468696E67206E6F206F6E652063616E207265616420746869732120492764206861746520666F72207468656D20746F206B6E6F7720746861742074686520666C6167206973206D616B655F737572655F796F75725F726E675F67656E6572617465735F6C6F7473615F7072696D65732E"
Which converted to text is: Good thing no one can read this! I'd hate for them to know that the flag is make_sure_your_rng_generates_lotsa_primes.

}}}
